member.name: P:Projects.Ceiba_Web.SuppressBuild
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether building the project before running it should be suppressed.
member.remarks: Projects added via ProjectReference items in the AppHost project file are built as part of building the AppHost project process so building them again before running is unnecessary. This property always returns true.
